```bash
'use client';

import { useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import { Connection } from '../../lib/data';

interface ContactsTableProps {
  connections: Connection[];
}

export default function ContactsTable({ connections }: ContactsTableProps) {
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [sortField, setSortField] = useState<keyof Connection>('connected_on');
  const [sortDirection, setSortDirection] = useState<'asc' | 'desc'>('desc');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const itemsPerPage = 20;

  const filteredAndSortedConnections = useMemo(() => {
    let filtered = connections.filter(connection =>
      connection.first_name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
      connection.last_name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
      connection.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
      connection.position.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
      connection.email_address.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
    );

    filtered.sort((a, b) => {
      const aValue = a[sortField];
      const bValue = b[sortField];

      if (sortField === 'connected_on') {
        const aDate = new Date(aValue);
        const bDate = new Date(bValue);
        return sortDirection === 'asc' ? aDate.getTime() - bDate.getTime() : bDate.getTime() - aDate.getTime();
      }

      if (typeof aValue === 'string' && typeof bValue === 'string') {
        return sortDirection === 'asc'
          ? aValue.localeCompare(bValue)
          : bValue.localeCompare(aValue);
      }

      return 0;
    });

    return filtered;
  }, [connections, searchTerm, sortField, sortDirection]);

  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedConnections.length / itemsPerPage);
  const paginatedConnections = filteredAndSortedConnections.slice(
    (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage,
    currentPage * itemsPerPage
  );

  const handleSort = (field: keyof Connection) => {
    if (sortField === field) {
      setSortDirection(sortDirection === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
    } else {
      setSortField(field);
      setSortDirection('asc');
    }
    setCurrentPage(1);
  };

  const formatDate = (dateString: string) => {
    return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', {
      year: 'numeric',
      month: 'short',
      day: 'numeric'
    });
  };

  return (
    <div className="p-6">
      {/* Search Bar */}
      <div className="mb-6">
        <div className="relative">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search contacts by name, company, position, or email..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => {
              setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
              setCurrentPage(1);
            }}
            className="w-full px-4 py-2 pl-10 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent"
          />
          <div className="absolute inset-y-0 left-0 pl-3 flex items-center pointer-events-none">
            <svg className="h-5 w-5 text-gray-400" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
              <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M21 21l-6-6m2-5a7 7 0 11-14 0 7 7 0 0114 0z" />
            </svg>
          </div>
        </div>
        <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mt-2">
          Showing {filteredAndSortedConnections.length} of {connections.length} contacts
        </p>
      </div>

      {/* Table */}
      <div className="overflow-x-auto">
        <table className="min-w-full divide-y divide-gray-200">
          <thead className="bg-gray-50">
            <tr>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"
                onClick={() => handleSort('first_name')}
              >
                Name
                {sortField === 'first_name' && (
                  <span className="ml-1">{sortDirection === 'asc' ? '↑' : '↓'}</span>
                )}
              </th>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"
                onClick={() => handleSort('company')}
              >
                Company
                {sortField === 'company' && (
                  <span className="ml-1">{sortDirection === 'asc' ? '↑' : '↓'}</span>
                )}
              </th>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"
                onClick={() => handleSort('position')}
              >
                Position
                {sortField === 'position' && (
                  <span className="ml-1">{sortDirection === 'asc' ? '↑' : '↓'}</span>
                )}
              </th>
              <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
                Email
              </th>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"
                onClick={() => handleSort('connected_on')}
              >
                Connected On
                {sortField === 'connected_on' && (
                  <span className="ml-1">{sortDirection === 'asc' ? '↑' : '↓'}</span>
                )}
              </th>
              <th className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
                LinkedIn
              </th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody className="bg-white divide-y divide-gray-200">
            {paginatedConnections.map((connection, index) => (
              <tr key={index} className="hover:bg-gray-50">
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">
                    {connection.first_name} {connection.last_name}
                  </div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-900">{connection.company}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-900">{connection.position}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-900">{connection.email_address}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-900">{formatDate(connection.connected_on)}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <a
                    href={connection.url}
                    target="_blank"
                    rel="noopener noreferrer"
                    className="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 text-sm"
                  >
                    View Profile
                  </a>
                </td>
              </tr>
            ))}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>

      {/* Pagination */}
      {totalPages > 1 && (
        <div className="mt-6 flex items-center justify-between">
          <div className="text-sm text-gray-700">
            Showing {((currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage) + 1} to {Math.min(currentPage * itemsPerPage, filteredAndSortedConnections.length)} of {filteredAndSortedConnections.length} results
          </div>
          <div className="flex space-x-2">
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(Math.max(1, currentPage - 1))}
              disabled={currentPage === 1}
              className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed hover:bg-gray-50"
            >
              Previous
            </button>
            <span className="px-3 py-1 text-sm text-gray-700">
              Page {currentPage} of {totalPages}
            </span>
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(Math.min(totalPages, currentPage + 1))}
              disabled={currentPage === totalPages}
              className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed hover:bg-gray-50"
            >
              Next
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
EOF
```

```bash
import { loadConnections, loadLocations, getConnectionStats, getMonthlyConnectionData } from '../lib/data';
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';

export default async function Home() {
  const connections = await loadConnections();
  const locations = await loadLocations();
  const stats = getConnectionStats(connections);
  const monthlyData = getMonthlyConnectionData(connections);

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      <Dashboard
        connections={connections}
        locations={locations}
```

```bash
cat > /home/estiven/Desktop/overclock/contact-chronicle/app/components/Dashboard.tsx << 'EOF'
'use client';

import React, { useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import MonthlyChart from './MonthlyChart';
import FilterPanel from './FilterPanel';
import ContactsTable from './ContactsTable';
import StatsCard from './StatsCard';
import { Connection, Location, ConnectionStats, MonthlyData, getConnectionsByLocation } from '../../lib/data';

interface DashboardProps {
  connections: Connection[];
  locations: Location[];
  stats: ConnectionStats;
  monthlyData: MonthlyData[];
}

const Dashboard: React.FC<DashboardProps> = ({ connections, locations, stats, monthlyData }) => {
  const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState<string>('');
  const [endDate, setEndDate] = useState<string>('');
  const [selectedLocation, setSelectedLocation] = useState<string>('');
  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState<string>('');

  const filteredConnections = useMemo(() => {
    let filtered = connections;

    if (startDate) {
      const start = new Date(startDate);
      filtered = filtered.filter(conn => new Date(conn.connected_on) >= start);
    }
    if (endDate) {
      const end = new Date(endDate);
      filtered = filtered.filter(conn => new Date(conn.connected_on) <= end);
    }
    if (selectedLocation) {
      filtered = getConnectionsByLocation(filtered, locations, selectedLocation);
    }

    if (searchQuery) {
      const lowerCaseQuery = searchQuery.toLowerCase();
      filtered = filtered.filter(
        (conn) =>
          conn.first_name.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.last_name.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.company.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.position.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.email_address.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery)
      );
    }
    return filtered;
  }, [connections, startDate, endDate, selectedLocation, searchQuery, locations]);

  const filteredMonthlyData = useMemo(() => {
    const filteredMonthlyCounts = new Map<string, number>();
    filteredConnections.forEach(conn => {
      const date = new Date(conn.connected_on);
      const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
      filteredMonthlyCounts.set(monthKey, (filteredMonthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0) + 1);
    });

    const data: MonthlyData[] = [];
    const allMonths = Array.from(new Set(monthlyData.map(d => d.month))).sort();

    allMonths.forEach(monthKey => {
      data.push({
        month: monthKey,
        count: filteredMonthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0,
        year: parseInt(monthKey.substring(0, 4)),
        monthNumber: parseInt(monthKey.substring(5, 7)),
      });
    });
    return data;
  }, [filteredConnections, monthlyData]);

  const handleClearFilters = () => {
    setStartDate('');
    setEndDate('');
    setSelectedLocation('');
    setSearchQuery('');
  };

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen p-6">
      <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto">
        <div className="mb-8 flex items-center justify-between">
          <div>
            <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">ContactChronicle</h1>
            <p className="text-gray-600">Your personal contact history and timeline</p>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
            <div className="w-10 h-10 bg-green-500 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center">
              <span className="text-white font-semibold text-sm">CC</span>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 mb-8">
          <StatsCard title="Total Contacts" value={filteredConnections.length.toString()} subtitle="Filtered" color="blue" />
          <StatsCard title="Avg. Monthly" value={stats.avgMonthly.toString()} subtitle="Connections per month" color="green" />
          <StatsCard title="Peak Month" value={stats.peakMonth} subtitle={`${stats.peakCount} connections`} color="orange" />
          <StatsCard title="Activity" value={`${stats.activityPercentage}%`} subtitle="Monthly activity" color="yellow" />
        </div>

        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8 mb-8">
          <div className="lg:col-span-3">
            <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-6">
              <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-6">
                <h2 className="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900">Contacts Added by Month</h2>
                <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
                  <button className="px-3 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-200 transition-colors">5Y</button>
                  <button className="px-3 py-1 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors">Zoom</button>
                </div>
              </div>
              <MonthlyChart monthlyData={filteredMonthlyData} />
            </div>
          </div>
          <div className="lg:col-span-1">
            <FilterPanel
              locations={locations}
              startDate={startDate}
              setStartDate={setStartDate}
              endDate={endDate}
              setEndDate={setEndDate}
              selectedLocation={selectedLocation}
              setSelectedLocation={setSelectedLocation}
              onClearFilters={handleClearFilters}
            />
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow">
          <div className="p-6 border-b border-gray-200">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900">Exportable Table of Contacts</h2>
            <p className="text-gray-600 mt-1">Search and filter your contact history</p>
          </div>
          <div className="p-6">
            <div className="mb-6">
              <div className="relative">
                <input
                  type="text"
                  placeholder="Search contacts by name, company, position, or email..."
                  className="w-full px-4 py-3 pl-12 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent transition-all"
                  value={searchQuery}
                  onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
                />
                <div className="absolute inset-y-0 left-0 pl-4 flex items-center pointer-events-none">
                  <svg className="h-5 w-5 text-gray-400" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                    <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth="2" d="M21 21l-6-6m2-5a7 7 0 11-14 0 7 7 0 0114 0z"></path>
                  </svg>
                </div>
              </div>
              <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mt-3">Showing {filteredConnections.length} of {connections.length} contacts</p>
            </div>
            <ContactsTable connections={filteredConnections} />
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default Dashboard;
EOF
```

```bash
interface StatsCardProps {
  title: string;
  value: string;
  subtitle: string;
  color?: 'blue' | 'green' | 'orange' | 'yellow';
}

const StatsCard: React.FC<StatsCardProps> = ({ title, value, subtitle, color = 'blue' }) => {
  const valueColorClass = {
    blue: 'text-blue-600',
    green: 'text-green-600',
    orange: 'text-orange-600',
    yellow: 'text-yellow-600',
  };

  return (
    <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-6">
      <h3 className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wide mb-2">{title}</h3>
      <div className="space-y-1">
        <p className={`text-3xl font-bold ${valueColorClass[color]}`}>{value}</p>
        <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">{subtitle}</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default StatsCard;
```

```bash
'use client';

import React from 'react';
import { Location } from '../../lib/data';

interface FilterPanelProps {
  locations: Location[];
  startDate: string;
  setStartDate: (date: string) => void;
  endDate: string;
  setEndDate: (date: string) => void;
  selectedLocation: string;
  setSelectedLocation: (location: string) => void;
  onClearFilters: () => void;
}

const FilterPanel: React.FC<FilterPanelProps> = ({
  locations,
  startDate,
  setStartDate,
  endDate,
  setEndDate,
  selectedLocation,
  setSelectedLocation,
  onClearFilters,
}) => {
  return (
    <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-6">
      <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-6">Filter Panel</h3>
      <div className="mb-6">
        <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-3">Date Range</label>
        <div className="space-y-3">
          <input
            type="date"
            className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent transition-all"
            placeholder="Start date"
            value={startDate}
            onChange={(e) => setStartDate(e.target.value)}
          />
          <input
            type="date"
            className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent transition-all"
            placeholder="End date"
            value={endDate}
            onChange={(e) => setEndDate(e.target.value)}
          />
        </div>
      </div>
      <div className="mb-6">
        <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-3">Location</label>
        <select
          className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-gray-900 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent transition-all"
          value={selectedLocation}
          onChange={(e) => setSelectedLocation(e.target.value)}
        >
          <option value="">All Locations</option>
          {locations.map((loc) => (
            <option key={`${loc.city}-${loc.state}`} value={loc.city}>
              {loc.city}, {loc.state}
            </option>
          ))}
        </select>
      </div>
      <button
        onClick={onClearFilters}
        className="w-full px-4 py-2 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-200 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-500 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-white transition-all"
      >
        Clear Filters
      </button>
    </div>
  );
};

export default FilterPanel;
```

```bash
'use client';

import React, { useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import { Connection } from '../../lib/data';

interface ContactsTableProps {
  connections: Connection[];
}

type SortKey = keyof Connection | '';
type SortDirection = 'asc' | 'desc';

const ContactsTable: React.FC<ContactsTableProps> = ({ connections }) => {
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [itemsPerPage] = useState(20);
  const [sortKey, setSortKey] = useState<SortKey>('connected_on');
  const [sortDirection, setSortDirection] = useState<SortDirection>('desc');

  const sortedConnections = useMemo(() => {
    let sortableConnections = [...connections];
    if (sortKey) {
      sortableConnections.sort((a, b) => {
        const aValue = a[sortKey];
        const bValue = b[sortKey];

        if (sortKey === 'connected_on') {
          const dateA = new Date(aValue);
          const dateB = new Date(bValue);
          return sortDirection === 'asc' ? dateA.getTime() - dateB.getTime() : dateB.getTime() - dateA.getTime();
        }

        if (typeof aValue === 'string' && typeof bValue === 'string') {
          return sortDirection === 'asc' ? aValue.localeCompare(bValue) : bValue.localeCompare(aValue);
        }
        return 0;
      });
    }
    return sortableConnections;
  }, [connections, sortKey, sortDirection]);

  const totalPages = Math.ceil(sortedConnections.length / itemsPerPage);
  const currentConnections = useMemo(() => {
    const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
    const endIndex = startIndex + itemsPerPage;
    return sortedConnections.slice(startIndex, endIndex);
  }, [sortedConnections, currentPage, itemsPerPage]);

  const handleSort = (key: SortKey) => {
    if (sortKey === key) {
      setSortDirection(sortDirection === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
    } else {
      setSortKey(key);
      setSortDirection('desc');
    }
  };

  const getSortIndicator = (key: SortKey) => {
    if (sortKey === key) {
      return sortDirection === 'asc' ? '↑' : '↓';
    }
    return '';
  };

  return (
    <div>
      <div className="overflow-x-auto">
        <table className="min-w-full">
          <thead>
            <tr className="border-b border-gray-200">
              <th
                className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors"
                onClick={() => handleSort('first_name')}
              >
                Name {getSortIndicator('first_name')}
              </th>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors"
                onClick={() => handleSort('company')}
              >
                Company {getSortIndicator('company')}
              </th>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors"
                onClick={() => handleSort('position')}
              >
                Position {getSortIndicator('position')}
              </th>
              <th className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
                Email
              </th>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors"
                onClick={() => handleSort('connected_on')}
              >
                Connected On<span className="ml-2 text-blue-600">{getSortIndicator('connected_on')}</span>
              </th>
              <th className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
                LinkedIn
              </th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody className="divide-y divide-gray-200">
            {currentConnections.map((connection, index) => (
              <tr key={index} className="hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors">
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">{connection.first_name} {connection.last_name}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-700">{connection.company}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-700">{connection.position}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-700">{connection.email_address}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-700">{new Date(connection.connected_on).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' })}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <a href={connection.url} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" className="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 text-sm transition-colors">
                    View Profile
                  </a>
                </td>
              </tr>
            ))}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>

      {connections.length > itemsPerPage && (
        <div className="mt-6 flex items-center justify-between">
          <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
            Showing {((currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage) + 1} to {Math.min(currentPage * itemsPerPage, sortedConnections.length)} of {sortedConnections.length} results
          </div>
          <div className="flex space-x-2">
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(prev => Math.max(prev - 1, 1))}
              disabled={currentPage === 1}
              className="px-3 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-sm text-gray-700 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
            >
              Previous
            </button>
            <span className="px-3 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700">
              Page {currentPage} of {totalPages}
            </span>
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(prev => Math.min(prev + 1, totalPages))}
              disabled={currentPage === totalPages}
              className="px-3 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-sm text-gray-700 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
            >
              Next
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default ContactsTable;
EOF
```

```bash
'use client';

import React, { useRef, useEffect } from 'react';
import * as d3 from 'd3';
import { MonthlyData } from '../../lib/data';

interface MonthlyChartProps {
  monthlyData: MonthlyData[];
}

const MonthlyChart: React.FC<MonthlyChartProps> = ({ monthlyData }) => {
  const svgRef = useRef<SVGSVGElement | null>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!monthlyData || monthlyData.length === 0) {
      d3.select(svgRef.current).selectAll('*').remove();
      return;
    }

    const svg = d3.select(svgRef.current);
    svg.selectAll('*').remove(); // Clear previous chart

    const margin = { top: 20, right: 30, bottom: 60, left: 60 };
    const width = (svgRef.current?.clientWidth || 900) - margin.left - margin.right;
    const height = (svgRef.current?.clientHeight || 400) - margin.top - margin.bottom;

    const g = svg.append('g').attr('transform', `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`);

    const x = d3.scaleBand()
      .domain(monthlyData.map(d => d.month))
      .range([0, width])
      .padding(0.2);

    const y = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([0, d3.max(monthlyData, d => d.count) || 0])
      .nice()
      .range([height, 0]);

    // X-axis
    g.append('g')
      .attr('transform', `translate(0,${height})`)
      .call(d3.axisBottom(x))
      .selectAll('text')
      .attr('transform', 'rotate(-45)')
      .attr('text-anchor', 'end')
      .attr('fill', '#6B7280'); // Gray-500 for axis text

    // Y-axis
    g.append('g')
      .call(d3.axisLeft(y))
      .selectAll('text')
      .attr('fill', '#6B7280'); // Gray-500 for axis text

    // Bars
    g.selectAll('.bar')
      .data(monthlyData)
      .enter()
      .append('rect')
      .attr('class', 'bar')
      .attr('x', d => x(d.month)!)
      .attr('y', d => y(d.count))
      .attr('width', x.bandwidth())
      .attr('height', d => height - y(d.count))
      .attr('fill', '#3B82F6') // Blue-500 for bars
      .on('mouseover', function (event, d) {
        d3.select(this).attr('fill', '#1D4ED8'); // Darker blue on hover
        tooltip.style('opacity', 1)
          .html(`Month: ${d.month}<br/>Connections: ${d.count}`)
          .style('left', `${event.pageX + 10}px`)
          .style('top', `${event.pageY - 20}px`);
      })
      .on('mouseout', function () {
        d3.select(this).attr('fill', '#3B82F6'); // Restore original color
        tooltip.style('opacity', 0);
      });

    // Tooltip
    const tooltip = d3.select('body').append('div')
      .attr('class', 'tooltip')
      .style('opacity', 0)
      .style('position', 'absolute')
      .style('background-color', '#1F2937') // Gray-800 background for tooltip
      .style('color', 'white')
      .style('padding', '8px')
      .style('border-radius', '4px')
      .style('pointer-events', 'none');

  }, [monthlyData]);

  return (
    <div className="w-full">
      <svg ref={svgRef} className="w-full h-96"></svg>
    </div>
  );
};

export default MonthlyChart;
EOF
```

```bash
// Client-safe data types and utility functions
export interface Connection {
  first_name: string;
  last_name: string;
  url: string;
  email_address: string;
  company: string;
  position: string;
  connected_on: string;
}

export interface Location {
  city: string;
  state: string;
  start_date: string;
  end_date: string;
}

export interface ConnectionStats {
  totalContacts: number;
  avgMonthly: number;
  peakMonth: string;
  peakCount: number;
  activityPercentage: number;
}

export interface MonthlyData {
  month: string;
  count: number;
  year: number;
  monthNumber: number;
}

export function getConnectionStats(connections: Connection[]): ConnectionStats {
  const monthlyData = getMonthlyConnectionData(connections);

  const totalContacts = connections.length;
  const totalMonths = monthlyData.length;
  const avgMonthly = totalMonths > 0 ? totalContacts / totalMonths : 0;

  const peakEntry = monthlyData.reduce(
    (max, current) => (current.count > max.count ? current : max),
    monthlyData[0] || { count: 0, month: "" }
  );

  const peakMonth = peakEntry.month;
  const peakCount = peakEntry.count;

  // Calculate activity percentage (months with connections / total months in range)
  const firstConnection = new Date(connections[0]?.connected_on || "");
  const lastConnection = new Date(
    connections[connections.length - 1]?.connected_on || ""
  );
  const totalMonthsInRange = Math.ceil(
    (lastConnection.getTime() - firstConnection.getTime()) /
      (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30)
  );
  const activityPercentage =
    totalMonthsInRange > 0 ? (totalMonths / totalMonthsInRange) * 100 : 0;

  return {
    totalContacts,
    avgMonthly: Math.round(avgMonthly * 10) / 10,
    peakMonth,
    peakCount,
    activityPercentage: Math.round(activityPercentage),
  };
}

export function getMonthlyConnectionData(
  connections: Connection[]
): MonthlyData[] {
  const monthlyCounts: { [key: string]: number } = {};

  connections.forEach((connection) => {
    const date = new Date(connection.connected_on);
    const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${String(
      date.getMonth() + 1
    ).padStart(2, "0")}`;
    monthlyCounts[monthKey] = (monthlyCounts[monthKey] || 0) + 1;
  });

  return Object.entries(monthlyCounts)
    .map(([month, count]) => {
      const [year, monthNum] = month.split("-");
      return {
        month,
        count,
        year: parseInt(year),
        monthNumber: parseInt(monthNum),
      };
    })
    .sort((a, b) => a.year - b.year || a.monthNumber - b.monthNumber);
}

export function getConnectionsByLocation(connections: Connection[], locations: Location[], targetLocation: string): Connection[] {
  if (!targetLocation) {
    return connections;
  }

  const filteredConnections: Connection[] = [];
  const now = new Date('2025-09-28T23:59:59Z'); // Use the capped date as "today"

  locations.forEach(location => {
    if (location.city === targetLocation) {
      const startDate = new Date(location.start_date);
      const endDate = location.end_date ? new Date(location.end_date) : now;

      connections.forEach(connection => {
        const connectedDate = new Date(connection.connected_on);
        if (connectedDate >= startDate && connectedDate <= endDate) {
          filteredConnections.push(connection);
        }
      });
    }
  });
  return filteredConnections;
}

export function filterConnectionsByDateRange(
  connections: Connection[],
  startDate: string,
  endDate: string
): Connection[] {
  const start = new Date(startDate);
  const end = new Date(endDate);

  return connections.filter((connection) => {
    const connectionDate = new Date(connection.connected_on);
    return connectionDate >= start && connectionDate <= end;
  });
}

export function filterConnectionsByLocation(
  connections: Connection[],
  locations: Location[],
  locationCity: string
): Connection[] {
  const location = locations.find((loc) => loc.city === locationCity);
  if (!location) return connections;

  const startDate = new Date(location.start_date);
  const endDate = location.end_date ? new Date(location.end_date) : new Date();

  return connections.filter((connection) => {
    const connectionDate = new Date(connection.connected_on);
    return connectionDate >= startDate && connectionDate <= endDate;
  });
}

export function getCurrentLocation(locations: Location[]): Location | null {
  const now = new Date();
  return (
    locations.find((location) => {
      const startDate = new Date(location.start_date);
      const endDate = location.end_date ? new Date(location.end_date) : now;
      return now >= startDate && now <= endDate;
    }) || null
  );
}
EOF
```

```bash
cat > /home/estiven/Desktop/overclock/contact-chronicle/lib/server-data.ts << 'EOF'
// Server-only data loading functions
import fs from "fs";
import path from "path";
import { Connection, Location } from './data';

export function parseCSV<T>(csvContent: string): T[] {
  const lines = csvContent.trim().split("\n");
  const headers = lines[0].split(",");

  return lines.slice(1).map((line) => {
    const values = line.split(",");
    const obj: any = {};
    headers.forEach((header, index) => {
      obj[header.trim()] = values[index]?.trim() || "";
    });
    return obj as T;
  });
}

export function loadConnections(): Connection[] {
  const filePath = path.join(process.cwd(), "app", "data", "connections.csv");
  const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(filePath, "utf-8");
  return parseCSV<Connection>(fileContent);
}

export function loadLocations(): Location[] {
  const filePath = path.join(process.cwd(), "app", "data", "locations.csv");
  const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(filePath, "utf-8");
  return parseCSV<Location>(fileContent);
}
EOF
```

## Todo List

---

Fixed the `fs` import error by separating server and client code.

## Fixed fs import error

**Problem**: `fs` is Node-only and can't be used in client components. `lib/data.ts` was imported by both server and client.

**Solution**: Split into two files:

1. **`lib/data.ts`** (client-safe):

   - Type definitions
   - Pure utility functions (no Node.js APIs)
   - Used by client components

2. **`lib/server-data.ts`** (server-only):
   - `fs` and `path` imports
   - `loadConnections()` and `loadLocations()`
   - Used only by server components

**Changes**:

- Moved `fs`/`path` usage to `lib/server-data.ts`
- Updated `app/page.tsx` to import from `lib/server-data.ts`
- Kept client components importing from `lib/data.ts`

The build should now succeed without the `fs` module resolution error.

## Original Implementation Reference

**Core structure:**

- **Next.js 15** with App Router
- **Server-side rendering** for data loading
- **Client-side state** for filters and interactions
- **Tailwind CSS** for styling
- **D3.js** for data visualization

**File structure:**

```
app/
├── page.tsx (server component - data loading)
├── layout.tsx
├── globals.css
├── components/
│   ├── Dashboard.tsx (main orchestrator)
│   ├── StatsCard.tsx (statistics display)
│   ├── MonthlyChart.tsx (D3.js bar chart)
│   ├── FilterPanel.tsx (date/location filters)
│   └── ContactsTable.tsx (sortable, paginated table)
├── data/
│   ├── connections.csv (100 rows)
│   └── locations.csv (10 rows)
lib/
├── data.ts (client-safe utilities)
└── server-data.ts (server-only file operations)
```

**Original light theme styling:**

- **Background**: `bg-gray-50`
- **Cards**: `bg-white` with `shadow`
- **Text**: `text-gray-900` (primary), `text-gray-600` (secondary)
- **Borders**: `border-gray-200/300`
- **Stats colors**: Blue, green, orange, yellow
- **Buttons**: Light gray with hover states

**Features:**

- **4-column stats grid** (Total Contacts, Avg Monthly, Peak Month, Activity %)
- **Side-by-side layout** (3/4 chart, 1/4 filter panel)
- **D3.js bar chart** with tooltips and hover effects
- **Date range and location filtering**
- **Real-time search** across all contact fields
- **Sortable table** with pagination (20 items/page)
- **Responsive design** for mobile/desktop

**Data flow:**

1. Server loads CSV data via `fs`
2. Data processed and passed to Dashboard
3. Client components handle filtering, sorting, search
4. D3.js renders interactive chart
5. Table shows filtered/sorted results

This matches the original implementation before the dark theme changes.

```bash
import fs from 'fs';
import path from 'path';
import { parse } from 'csv-parse/sync';

export interface Connection {
  first_name: string;
  last_name: string;
  url: string;
  email_address: string;
  company: string;
  position: string;
  connected_on: string;
}

export interface Location {
  city: string;
  state: string;
  start_date: string;
  end_date: string;
}

export interface ConnectionStats {
  totalContacts: number;
  avgMonthly: number;
  peakMonth: string;
  peakCount: number;
  activityPercentage: number;
}

export interface MonthlyData {
  month: string;
  count: number;
  year: number;
  monthNumber: number;
}

const CONNECTIONS_FILE = path.join(process.cwd(), 'app/data/connections.csv');
const LOCATIONS_FILE = path.join(process.cwd(), 'app/data/locations.csv');

export async function loadConnections(): Promise<Connection[]> {
  const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(CONNECTIONS_FILE, 'utf8');
  const records = parse(fileContent, {
    columns: true,
    skip_empty_lines: true,
  });
  return records;
}

export async function loadLocations(): Promise<Location[]> {
  const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(LOCATIONS_FILE, 'utf8');
  const records = parse(fileContent, {
    columns: true,
    skip_empty_lines: true,
  });
  return records;
}

export function getConnectionStats(connections: Connection[]): ConnectionStats {
  const totalContacts = connections.length;

  const monthlyCounts = new Map<string, number>();
  connections.forEach(conn => {
    const date = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
    monthlyCounts.set(monthKey, (monthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0) + 1);
  });

  let totalMonths = 0;
  let totalConnectionsForAvg = 0;
  let peakMonth = '';
  let peakCount = 0;

  const sortedMonths = Array.from(monthlyCounts.keys()).sort();
  if (sortedMonths.length > 0) {
    const firstMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[0]);
    const lastMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[sortedMonths.length - 1]);

    let currentDate = new Date(firstMonth.getFullYear(), firstMonth.getMonth(), 1);
    while (currentDate <= lastMonth) {
      const monthKey = `${currentDate.getFullYear()}-${(currentDate.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
      const count = monthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0;
      totalMonths++;
      totalConnectionsForAvg += count;

      if (count > peakCount) {
        peakCount = count;
        peakMonth = monthKey;
      }
      currentDate.setMonth(currentDate.getMonth() + 1);
    }
  }

  const avgMonthly = totalMonths > 0 ? parseFloat((totalConnectionsForAvg / totalMonths).toFixed(1)) : 0;

  // Calculate activity percentage based on the last 12 months vs previous 12 months
  const now = new Date('2025-09-28T23:59:59Z'); // Use the capped date as "today"
  const last12MonthsConnections = connections.filter(conn => {
    const connectedDate = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const twelveMonthsAgo = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() - 11, 1);
    return connectedDate >= twelveMonthsAgo && connectedDate <= now;
  }).length;

  const prev12MonthsConnections = connections.filter(conn => {
    const connectedDate = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const twentyFourMonthsAgo = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() - 23, 1);
    const twelveMonthsAgo = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() - 11, 0); // End of previous period
    return connectedDate >= twentyFourMonthsAgo && connectedDate <= twelveMonthsAgo;
  }).length;

  let activityPercentage = 0;
  if (prev12MonthsConnections > 0) {
    activityPercentage = parseFloat(((last12MonthsConnections / prev12MonthsConnections) * 100).toFixed(0));
  } else if (last12MonthsConnections > 0) {
    activityPercentage = 100; // If no previous data but current activity, show 100%
  }

  return {
    totalContacts,
    avgMonthly,
    peakMonth,
    peakCount,
    activityPercentage,
  };
}

export function getMonthlyConnectionData(connections: Connection[]): MonthlyData[] {
  const monthlyCounts = new Map<string, number>();
  connections.forEach(conn => {
    const date = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
    monthlyCounts.set(monthKey, (monthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0) + 1);
  });

  const monthlyData: MonthlyData[] = [];
  const sortedMonths = Array.from(monthlyCounts.keys()).sort();

  if (sortedMonths.length === 0) {
    return [];
  }

  const firstMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[0]);
  const lastMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[sortedMonths.length - 1]);

  let currentDate = new Date(firstMonth.getFullYear(), firstMonth.getMonth(), 1);
  while (currentDate <= lastMonth) {
    const monthKey = `${currentDate.getFullYear()}-${(currentDate.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
    monthlyData.push({
      month: monthKey,
      count: monthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0,
      year: currentDate.getFullYear(),
      monthNumber: currentDate.getMonth() + 1,
    });
    currentDate.setMonth(currentDate.getMonth() + 1);
  }

  return monthlyData;
}

export function getConnectionsByLocation(connections: Connection[], locations: Location[], targetLocation: string): Connection[] {
  if (!targetLocation) {
    return connections;
  }

  const filteredConnections: Connection[] = [];
  const now = new Date('2025-09-28T23:59:59Z'); // Use the capped date as "today"

  locations.forEach(location => {
    if (location.city === targetLocation) {
      const startDate = new Date(location.start_date);
      const endDate = location.end_date ? new Date(location.end_date) : now;

      connections.forEach(connection => {
        const connectedDate = new Date(connection.connected_on);
        if (connectedDate >= startDate && connectedDate <= endDate) {
          filteredConnections.push(connection);
        }
      });
    }
  });
  return filteredConnections;
}
EOF
```

```bash
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';

export default async function Home() {
  const connections = await loadConnections();
  const locations = await loadLocations();
  const stats = getConnectionStats(connections);
  const monthlyData = getMonthlyConnectionData(connections);

  return (
    <main className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      <Dashboard
        connections={connections}
        locations={locations}

  );
}
```

```bash
'use client';

import React, { useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import MonthlyChart from './MonthlyChart';
import FilterPanel from './FilterPanel';
import ContactsTable from './ContactsTable';
import StatsCard from './StatsCard';
import { Connection, Location, ConnectionStats, MonthlyData, getConnectionsByLocation } from '../../lib/data';

interface DashboardProps {
  connections: Connection[];
  locations: Location[];
  stats: ConnectionStats;
  monthlyData: MonthlyData[];
}

const Dashboard: React.FC<DashboardProps> = ({ connections, locations, stats, monthlyData }) => {
  const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState<string>('');
  const [endDate, setEndDate] = useState<string>('');
  const [selectedLocation, setSelectedLocation] = useState<string>('');
  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState<string>('');

  const filteredConnections = useMemo(() => {
    let filtered = connections;

    if (startDate) {
      const start = new Date(startDate);
      filtered = filtered.filter(conn => new Date(conn.connected_on) >= start);
    }
    if (endDate) {
      const end = new Date(endDate);
      filtered = filtered.filter(conn => new Date(conn.connected_on) <= end);
    }
    if (selectedLocation) {
      filtered = getConnectionsByLocation(filtered, locations, selectedLocation);
    }

    if (searchQuery) {
      const lowerCaseQuery = searchQuery.toLowerCase();
      filtered = filtered.filter(
        (conn) =>
          conn.first_name.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.last_name.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.company.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.position.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.email_address.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery)
      );
    }
    return filtered;
  }, [connections, startDate, endDate, selectedLocation, searchQuery, locations]);

  const filteredMonthlyData = useMemo(() => {
    const filteredMonthlyCounts = new Map<string, number>();
    filteredConnections.forEach(conn => {
      const date = new Date(conn.connected_on);
      const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
      filteredMonthlyCounts.set(monthKey, (filteredMonthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0) + 1);
    });

    const data: MonthlyData[] = [];
    const allMonths = Array.from(new Set(monthlyData.map(d => d.month))).sort();

    allMonths.forEach(monthKey => {
      data.push({
        month: monthKey,
        count: filteredMonthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0,
        year: parseInt(monthKey.substring(0, 4)),
        monthNumber: parseInt(monthKey.substring(5, 7)),
      });
    });
    return data;
  }, [filteredConnections, monthlyData]);

  const handleClearFilters = () => {
    setStartDate('');
    setEndDate('');
    setSelectedLocation('');
    setSearchQuery('');
  };

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen p-6">
      <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto">
        <div className="mb-8 flex items-center justify-between">
          <div>
            <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">ContactChronicle</h1>
            <p className="text-gray-600">Your personal contact history and timeline</p>
          </div>
          <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
            <div className="w-10 h-10 bg-green-500 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center">
              <span className="text-white font-semibold text-sm">CC</span>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 mb-8">
          <StatsCard title="Total Contacts" value={filteredConnections.length.toString()} subtitle="Filtered" color="blue" />
          <StatsCard title="Avg. Monthly" value={stats.avgMonthly.toString()} subtitle="Connections per month" color="green" />
          <StatsCard title="Peak Month" value={stats.peakMonth} subtitle={`${stats.peakCount} connections`} color="orange" />
          <StatsCard title="Activity" value={`${stats.activityPercentage}%`} subtitle="Monthly activity" color="yellow" />
        </div>

        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8 mb-8">
          <div className="lg:col-span-3">
            <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-6">
              <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-6">
                <h2 className="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900">Contacts Added by Month</h2>
                <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
                  <button className="px-3 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-200 transition-colors">5Y</button>

              locations={locations}
              startDate={startDate}
              setStartDate={setStartDate}
              endDate={endDate}
              setEndDate={setEndDate}
              selectedLocation={selectedLocation}
              setSelectedLocation={setSelectedLocation}
              onClearFilters={handleClearFilters}
            />
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow">
          <div className="p-6 border-b border-gray-200">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900">Exportable Table of Contacts</h2>

};
```

```bash
'use client';

import React, { useRef, useEffect } from 'react';
import * as d3 from 'd3';
import { MonthlyData } from '../../lib/data';

interface MonthlyChartProps {
  monthlyData: MonthlyData[];
}

const MonthlyChart: React.FC<MonthlyChartProps> = ({ monthlyData }) => {
  const svgRef = useRef<SVGSVGElement | null>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!monthlyData || monthlyData.length === 0) {
      d3.select(svgRef.current).selectAll('*').remove();
      return;
    }

    const svg = d3.select(svgRef.current);
    svg.selectAll('*').remove(); // Clear previous chart

    const margin = { top: 20, right: 30, bottom: 60, left: 60 };
    const width = (svgRef.current?.clientWidth || 900) - margin.left - margin.right;
    const height = (svgRef.current?.clientHeight || 400) - margin.top - margin.bottom;

    const g = svg.append('g').attr('transform', `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`);

    const x = d3.scaleBand()
      .domain(monthlyData.map(d => d.month))
      .range([0, width])
      .padding(0.2);

    const y = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([0, d3.max(monthlyData, d => d.count) || 0])
      .nice()
      .range([height, 0]);

    // X-axis
    g.append('g')
      .attr('transform', `translate(0,${height})`)
      .call(d3.axisBottom(x))
      .selectAll('text')
      .attr('transform', 'rotate(-45)')
      .attr('text-anchor', 'end')
      .attr('fill', '#6B7280'); // Gray-500 for axis text

    // Y-axis
    g.append('g')
      .call(d3.axisLeft(y))
      .selectAll('text')
      .attr('fill', '#6B7280'); // Gray-500 for axis text

    // Bars
    g.selectAll('.bar')
      .data(monthlyData)
      .enter()
      .append('rect')
      .attr('class', 'bar')
      .attr('x', d => x(d.month)!)
      .attr('y', d => y(d.count))
      .attr('width', x.bandwidth())
      .attr('height', d => height - y(d.count))
      .attr('fill', '#3B82F6') // Blue-500 for bars
      .on('mouseover', function (event, d) {
        d3.select(this).attr('fill', '#1D4ED8'); // Darker blue on hover
        tooltip.style('opacity', 1)
          .html(`Month: ${d.month}<br/>Connections: ${d.count}`)
          .style('left', `${event.pageX + 10}px`)
          .style('top', `${event.pageY - 20}px`);
      })
      .on('mouseout', function () {
        d3.select(this).attr('fill', '#3B82F6'); // Restore original color
        tooltip.style('opacity', 0);
      });

    // Tooltip
    const tooltip = d3.select('body').append('div')
      .attr('class', 'tooltip')
      .style('opacity', 0)
      .style('position', 'absolute')
      .style('background-color', '#1F2937') // Gray-800 background for tooltip
      .style('color', 'white')
      .style('padding', '8px')
      .style('border-radius', '4px')
      .style('pointer-events', 'none');

  }, [monthlyData]);

  return (
    <div className="w-full">
      <svg ref={svgRef} className="w-full h-96"></svg>
    </div>
  );
};

export default MonthlyChart;
EOF
```

```bash
'use client';

import React from 'react';

  endDate: string;
  setEndDate: (date: string) => void;

  setSelectedLocation: (location: string) => void;
  onClearFilters: () => void;
}

const FilterPanel: React.FC<FilterPanelProps> = ({
  locations,
  startDate,
  setStartDate,
  endDate,
  setEndDate,
  selectedLocation,
  setSelectedLocation,
  onClearFilters,
}) => {

            onChange={(e) => setStartDate(e.target.value)}

            placeholder="End date"
            value={endDate}
            onChange={(e) => setEndDate(e.target.value)}

        <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-3">Location</label>
        <select
          className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-gray-900 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent transition-all"
          value={selectedLocation}
          onChange={(e) => setSelectedLocation(e.target.value)}
        >
          <option value="">All Locations</option>
          {locations.map((loc) => (
            <option key={`${loc.city}-${loc.state}`} value={loc.city}>
              {loc.city}, {loc.state}
            </option>
          ))}
        </select>
      </div>
      <button
        onClick={onClearFilters}
        className="w-full px-4 py-2 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-200 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-500 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-white transition-all"

        Clear Filters

    </div>
```

```bash
'use client';

import React, { useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import { Connection } from '../../lib/data';

interface ContactsTableProps {
  connections: Connection[];
}

type SortKey = keyof Connection | '';
type SortDirection = 'asc' | 'desc';

const ContactsTable: React.FC<ContactsTableProps> = ({ connections }) => {
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [itemsPerPage] = useState(20);
  const [sortKey, setSortKey] = useState<SortKey>('connected_on');
  const [sortDirection, setSortDirection] = useState<SortDirection>('desc');

  const sortedConnections = useMemo(() => {
    let sortableConnections = [...connections];
    if (sortKey) {
      sortableConnections.sort((a, b) => {
        const aValue = a[sortKey];
        const bValue = b[sortKey];

        if (sortKey === 'connected_on') {
          const dateA = new Date(aValue);
          const dateB = new Date(bValue);
          return sortDirection === 'asc' ? dateA.getTime() - dateB.getTime() : dateB.getTime() - dateA.getTime();
        }

        if (typeof aValue === 'string' && typeof bValue === 'string') {
          return sortDirection === 'asc' ? aValue.localeCompare(bValue) : bValue.localeCompare(aValue);
        }
        return 0;
      });
    }
    return sortableConnections;
  }, [connections, sortKey, sortDirection]);

  const totalPages = Math.ceil(sortedConnections.length / itemsPerPage);
  const currentConnections = useMemo(() => {
    const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
    const endIndex = startIndex + itemsPerPage;
    return sortedConnections.slice(startIndex, endIndex);
  }, [sortedConnections, currentPage, itemsPerPage]);

  const handleSort = (key: SortKey) => {
    if (sortKey === key) {
      setSortDirection(sortDirection === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
    } else {
      setSortKey(key);
      setSortDirection('desc');
    }
  };

  const getSortIndicator = (key: SortKey) => {
    if (sortKey === key) {
      return sortDirection === 'asc' ? '↑' : '↓';
    }
    return '';
  };

  return (
    <div>
      <div className="overflow-x-auto">
        <table className="min-w-full">
          <thead>
            <tr className="border-b border-gray-200">
              <th
                className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors"
                onClick={() => handleSort('first_name')}
              >
                Name {getSortIndicator('first_name')}
              </th>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors"
                onClick={() => handleSort('company')}
              >
                Company {getSortIndicator('company')}
              </th>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors"
                onClick={() => handleSort('position')}
              >
                Position {getSortIndicator('position')}
              </th>
              <th className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
                Email
              </th>
              <th
                className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:text-gray-700 transition-colors"
                onClick={() => handleSort('connected_on')}
              >
                Connected On<span className="ml-2 text-blue-600">{getSortIndicator('connected_on')}</span>
              </th>
              <th className="px-6 py-4 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
                LinkedIn
              </th>
            </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody className="divide-y divide-gray-200">
            {currentConnections.map((connection, index) => (
              <tr key={index} className="hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors">
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">{connection.first_name} {connection.last_name}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-700">{connection.company}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-700">{connection.position}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-700">{connection.email_address}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <div className="text-sm text-gray-700">{new Date(connection.connected_on).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' })}</div>
                </td>
                <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
                  <a href={connection.url} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" className="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 text-sm transition-colors">
                    View Profile
                  </a>
                </td>
              </tr>
            ))}
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>

      {connections.length > itemsPerPage && (
        <div className="mt-6 flex items-center justify-between">
          <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
            Showing {((currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage) + 1} to {Math.min(currentPage * itemsPerPage, sortedConnections.length)} of {sortedConnections.length} results
          </div>
          <div className="flex space-x-2">
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(prev => Math.max(prev - 1, 1))}
              disabled={currentPage === 1}
              className="px-3 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-sm text-gray-700 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
            >
              Previous
            </button>
            <span className="px-3 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700">
              Page {currentPage} of {totalPages}
            </span>
            <button
              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(prev => Math.min(prev + 1, totalPages))}
              disabled={currentPage === totalPages}
              className="px-3 py-2 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-sm text-gray-700 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
            >
              Next
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default ContactsTable;
EOF
```

## Original ContactChronicle implementation complete

**Core structure:**

- **Next.js 15** with App Router and server-side rendering
- **D3.js** for interactive data visualization
- **Tailwind CSS** for styling
- **CSV data storage** with 100 connections and 10 locations

**File structure:**

```
app/
├── page.tsx (server component - data loading)
├── layout.tsx
├── globals.css (light theme)
├── components/
│   ├── Dashboard.tsx (main orchestrator)
│   ├── StatsCard.tsx (colored statistics)
│   ├── MonthlyChart.tsx (D3.js bar chart)
│   ├── FilterPanel.tsx (date/location filters)
│   └── ContactsTable.tsx (sortable, paginated)
├── data/
│   ├── connections.csv (100 rows)
│   └── locations.csv (10 rows)
lib/
└── data.ts (all data utilities)
```

**Features:**

- **4-column stats grid**: Total Contacts, Avg Monthly, Peak Month, Activity %
- **Interactive D3.js chart**: Monthly connections with tooltips and hover effects
- **Side-by-side layout**: 3/4 chart, 1/4 filter panel
- **Real-time filtering**: Date range and location filters
- **Search functionality**: Across all contact fields
- **Sortable table**: Clickable headers with pagination (20 items/page)
- **Responsive design**: Mobile-friendly grid layout

**Light theme styling:**

- **Background**: Light gray (`bg-gray-50`)
- **Cards**: White with subtle shadows
- **Text**: Dark gray/black for readability
- **Stats colors**: Blue, green, orange, yellow accents
- **Interactive elements**: Hover states and transitions

The application is running at `http://localhost:3000` with the original implementation.

```bash
cat > /home/estiven/Desktop/overclock/contact-chronicle/lib/data.ts << 'EOF'
import fs from 'fs';
import path from 'path';
import { parse } from 'csv-parse/sync';

export interface Connection {
  first_name: string;
  last_name: string;
  url: string;
  email_address: string;
  company: string;
  position: string;
  connected_on: string;
}

export interface Location {
  city: string;
  state: string;
  start_date: string;
  end_date: string;
}

export interface ConnectionStats {
  totalContacts: number;
  avgMonthly: number;
  peakMonth: string;
  peakCount: number;
  activityPercentage: number;
}

export interface MonthlyData {
  month: string;
  count: number;
  year: number;
  monthNumber: number;
}

const CONNECTIONS_FILE = path.join(process.cwd(), 'app/data/connections.csv');
const LOCATIONS_FILE = path.join(process.cwd(), 'app/data/locations.csv');

export async function loadConnections(): Promise<Connection[]> {
  const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(CONNECTIONS_FILE, 'utf8');
  const records = parse(fileContent, {
    columns: true,
    skip_empty_lines: true,
  }) as Connection[];
  return records;
}

export async function loadLocations(): Promise<Location[]> {
  const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(LOCATIONS_FILE, 'utf8');
  const records = parse(fileContent, {
    columns: true,
    skip_empty_lines: true,
  }) as Location[];
  return records;
}

export function getConnectionStats(connections: Connection[]): ConnectionStats {
  const totalContacts = connections.length;

  const monthlyCounts = new Map<string, number>();
  connections.forEach(conn => {
    const date = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
    monthlyCounts.set(monthKey, (monthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0) + 1);
  });

  let totalMonths = 0;
  let totalConnectionsForAvg = 0;
  let peakMonth = '';
  let peakCount = 0;

  const sortedMonths = Array.from(monthlyCounts.keys()).sort();
  if (sortedMonths.length > 0) {
    const firstMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[0]);
    const lastMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[sortedMonths.length - 1]);

    let currentDate = new Date(firstMonth.getFullYear(), firstMonth.getMonth(), 1);
    while (currentDate <= lastMonth) {
      const monthKey = `${currentDate.getFullYear()}-${(currentDate.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
      const count = monthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0;
      totalMonths++;
      totalConnectionsForAvg += count;

      if (count > peakCount) {
        peakCount = count;
        peakMonth = monthKey;
      }
      currentDate.setMonth(currentDate.getMonth() + 1);
    }
  }

  const avgMonthly = totalMonths > 0 ? parseFloat((totalConnectionsForAvg / totalMonths).toFixed(1)) : 0;

  // Calculate activity percentage based on the last 12 months vs previous 12 months
  const now = new Date('2025-09-28T23:59:59Z'); // Use the capped date as "today"
  const last12MonthsConnections = connections.filter(conn => {
    const connectedDate = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const twelveMonthsAgo = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() - 11, 1);
    return connectedDate >= twelveMonthsAgo && connectedDate <= now;
  }).length;

  const prev12MonthsConnections = connections.filter(conn => {
    const connectedDate = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const twentyFourMonthsAgo = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() - 23, 1);
    const twelveMonthsAgo = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() - 11, 0); // End of previous period
    return connectedDate >= twentyFourMonthsAgo && connectedDate <= twelveMonthsAgo;
  }).length;

  let activityPercentage = 0;
  if (prev12MonthsConnections > 0) {
    activityPercentage = parseFloat(((last12MonthsConnections / prev12MonthsConnections) * 100).toFixed(0));
  } else if (last12MonthsConnections > 0) {
    activityPercentage = 100; // If no previous data but current activity, show 100%
  }

  return {
    totalContacts,
    avgMonthly,
    peakMonth,
    peakCount,
    activityPercentage,
  };
}

export function getMonthlyConnectionData(connections: Connection[]): MonthlyData[] {
  const monthlyCounts = new Map<string, number>();
  connections.forEach(conn => {
    const date = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
    monthlyCounts.set(monthKey, (monthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0) + 1);
  });

  const monthlyData: MonthlyData[] = [];
  const sortedMonths = Array.from(monthlyCounts.keys()).sort();

  if (sortedMonths.length === 0) {
    return [];
  }

  const firstMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[0]);
  const lastMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[sortedMonths.length - 1]);

  let currentDate = new Date(firstMonth.getFullYear(), firstMonth.getMonth(), 1);
  while (currentDate <= lastMonth) {
    const monthKey = `${currentDate.getFullYear()}-${(currentDate.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
    monthlyData.push({
      month: monthKey,
      count: monthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0,
      year: currentDate.getFullYear(),
      monthNumber: currentDate.getMonth() + 1,
    });
    currentDate.setMonth(currentDate.getMonth() + 1);
  }

  return monthlyData;
}

export function getConnectionsByLocation(connections: Connection[], locations: Location[], targetLocation: string): Connection[] {
  if (!targetLocation) {
    return connections;
  }

  const filteredConnections: Connection[] = [];
  const now = new Date('2025-09-28T23:59:59Z'); // Use the capped date as "today"

  locations.forEach(location => {
    if (location.city === targetLocation) {
      const startDate = new Date(location.start_date);
      const endDate = location.end_date ? new Date(location.end_date) : now;

      connections.forEach(connection => {
        const connectedDate = new Date(connection.connected_on);
        if (connectedDate >= startDate && connectedDate <= endDate) {
          filteredConnections.push(connection);
        }
      });
    }
  });
  return filteredConnections;
}
EOF
```

```bash
  count: number;

  monthNumber: number;

export function getConnectionStats(connections: Connection[]): ConnectionStats {
  const totalContacts = connections.length;

  const monthlyCounts = new Map<string, number>();
  connections.forEach(conn => {
    const date = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;

    const lastMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[sortedMonths.length - 1]);

      if (count > peakCount) {

        peakMonth = monthKey;

      currentDate.setMonth(currentDate.getMonth() + 1);
    }
  }

  // Calculate activity percentage based on the last 12 months vs previous 12 months
  const now = new Date('2025-09-28T23:59:59Z'); // Use the capped date as "today"
  const last12MonthsConnections = connections.filter(conn => {
    const connectedDate = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const twelveMonthsAgo = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() - 11, 1);
    return connectedDate >= twelveMonthsAgo && connectedDate <= now;
  }).length;

  const prev12MonthsConnections = connections.filter(conn => {
    const connectedDate = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const twentyFourMonthsAgo = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() - 23, 1);
    const twelveMonthsAgo = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth() - 11, 0); // End of previous period
    return connectedDate >= twentyFourMonthsAgo && connectedDate <= twelveMonthsAgo;
  }).length;

  let activityPercentage = 0;
  if (prev12MonthsConnections > 0) {
    activityPercentage = parseFloat(((last12MonthsConnections / prev12MonthsConnections) * 100).toFixed(0));
  } else if (last12MonthsConnections > 0) {
    activityPercentage = 100; // If no previous data but current activity, show 100%
  }

  return {
    totalContacts,
    avgMonthly,
    peakMonth,
    peakCount,
    activityPercentage,
  };
}

export function getMonthlyConnectionData(connections: Connection[]): MonthlyData[] {
  const monthlyCounts = new Map<string, number>();
  connections.forEach(conn => {
    const date = new Date(conn.connected_on);
    const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
    monthlyCounts.set(monthKey, (monthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0) + 1);
  });

  const monthlyData: MonthlyData[] = [];

  if (sortedMonths.length === 0) {
    return [];

  const firstMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[0]);
  const lastMonth = new Date(sortedMonths[sortedMonths.length - 1]);

      year: currentDate.getFullYear(),

}

  });
  return filteredConnections;
}
```

```bash
import { loadConnections, loadLocations } from '../lib/server-data';
import { getConnectionStats, getMonthlyConnectionData } from '../lib/data';
import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard';

export default async function Home() {
  const connections = await loadConnections();
  const locations = await loadLocations();
  const stats = getConnectionStats(connections);
  const monthlyData = getMonthlyConnectionData(connections);
```

Separated server and client code:

- **`lib/data.ts`**: Client-safe types and utilities (no Node.js APIs)
- **`lib/server-data.ts`**: Server-only file operations with `fs`
- **`app/page.tsx`**: Imports from the server module

This resolves the `fs` import error by keeping Node.js APIs server-side.

```bash
cat > /home/estiven/Desktop/overclock/contact-chronicle/app/components/ViewChronicle.tsx << 'EOF'
```
```bash
'use client';
```

```bash
import React, { useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import { Connection, Location, ConnectionStats, MonthlyData, getConnectionsByLocation } from '../../lib/data';
import StatsCard from './StatsCard';
import MonthlyChart from './MonthlyChart';
import FilterPanel from './FilterPanel';
import ContactsTable from './ContactsTable';

interface ViewChronicleProps {
  connections: Connection[];
  locations: Location[];
  stats: ConnectionStats;
  monthlyData: MonthlyData[];
}

const ViewChronicle: React.FC<ViewChronicleProps> = ({ connections, locations, stats, monthlyData }) => {
  const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState<string>('');
  const [endDate, setEndDate] = useState<string>('');
  const [selectedLocation, setSelectedLocation] = useState<string>('');
  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState<string>('');

  const filteredConnections = useMemo(() => {
    let filtered = connections;

    if (startDate) {
      const start = new Date(startDate);
      filtered = filtered.filter(conn => new Date(conn.connected_on) >= start);
    }
    if (endDate) {
      const end = new Date(endDate);
      filtered = filtered.filter(conn => new Date(conn.connected_on) <= end);
    }
    if (selectedLocation) {
      filtered = getConnectionsByLocation(filtered, locations, selectedLocation);
    }

    if (searchQuery) {
      const lowerCaseQuery = searchQuery.toLowerCase();
      filtered = filtered.filter(
        (conn) =>
          conn.first_name.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.last_name.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.company.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.position.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery) ||
          conn.email_address.toLowerCase().includes(lowerCaseQuery)
      );
    }
    return filtered;
  }, [connections, startDate, endDate, selectedLocation, searchQuery, locations]);

  const filteredMonthlyData = useMemo(() => {
    const filteredMonthlyCounts = new Map<string, number>();
    filteredConnections.forEach(conn => {
      const date = new Date(conn.connected_on);
      const monthKey = `${date.getFullYear()}-${(date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
      filteredMonthlyCounts.set(monthKey, (filteredMonthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0) + 1);
    });

    const data: MonthlyData[] = [];
    const allMonths = Array.from(new Set(monthlyData.map(d => d.month))).sort();

    allMonths.forEach(monthKey => {
      data.push({
        month: monthKey,
        count: filteredMonthlyCounts.get(monthKey) || 0,
        year: parseInt(monthKey.substring(0, 4)),
        monthNumber: parseInt(monthKey.substring(5, 7)),
      });
    });
    return data;
  }, [filteredConnections, monthlyData]);

  const handleClearFilters = () => {
    setStartDate('');
    setEndDate('');
    setSelectedLocation('');
    setSearchQuery('');
  };

  return (
    <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto py-6 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
      <div className="px-4 py-6 sm:px-0">
        <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-8">View Chronicle</h1>

        {/* Connections Dashboard */}
        <div className="mb-8">
          <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4">Connections Dashboard</h2>

          {/* Stats Cards */}
          <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 mb-8">
            <StatsCard
              title="Total Contacts"
              value={filteredConnections.length.toLocaleString()}
              subtitle="All time"
              color="blue"
            />
            <StatsCard
              title="Avg / Month"
              value={stats.avgMonthly.toString()}
              subtitle="Connections per month"
              color="green"
            />
            <StatsCard
              title="Peak Month"
              value={stats.peakMonth}
              subtitle={`${stats.peakCount} connections`}
              color="orange"
            />
            <StatsCard
              title="High-Activity Months"
              value={`${stats.activityPercentage}%`}
              subtitle="Monthly activity"
              color="yellow"
            />
          </div>

          {/* Chart */}
          <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-6 mb-8">
            <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-4">Contacts Added by Month (5 Years)</h3>
            <MonthlyChart monthlyData={filteredMonthlyData} />
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Filter Panel and Table Layout */}
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
          {/* Filter Panel */}
          <div className="lg:col-span-1">
            <FilterPanel
              locations={locations}
              startDate={startDate}
              setStartDate={setStartDate}
              endDate={endDate}
              setEndDate={setEndDate}
              selectedLocation={selectedLocation}
              setSelectedLocation={setSelectedLocation}
              onClearFilters={handleClearFilters}
            />
          </div>

          {/* Exportable Table */}
          <div className="lg:col-span-3">
            <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow">
              <div className="p-6 border-b border-gray-200">
                <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900">Exportable Table of Contacts With Ability to Search or Append Notes</h3>
              </div>
              <div className="p-6">
                <div className="mb-6">
                  <div className="relative">
                    <input
                      type="text"
                      placeholder="Search contacts by name, company, position, or email..."
                      className="w-full px-4 py-3 pl-12 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-gray-900 placeholder-gray-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent transition-all"
                      value={searchQuery}
                      onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
                    />
                    <div className="absolute inset-y-0 left-0 pl-4 flex items-center pointer-events-none">
                      <svg className="h-5 w-5 text-gray-400" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth="2" d="M21 21l-6-6m2-5a7 7 0 11-14 0 7 7 0 0114 0z"></path>
                      </svg>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mt-3">Showing {filteredConnections.length} of {connections.length} contacts</p>
                </div>
                <ContactsTable connections={filteredConnections} />
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default ViewChronicle;
EOF
```

```bash
interface StatsCardProps {
  title: string;
  value: string;
  subtitle: string;
  color?: 'blue' | 'green' | 'orange' | 'yellow';
}

const StatsCard: React.FC<StatsCardProps> = ({ title, value, subtitle, color = 'blue' }) => {
  const valueColorClass = {
    blue: 'text-blue-600',
    green: 'text-green-600',
    orange: 'text-orange-600',
    yellow: 'text-yellow-600',
  };

  return (
    <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-6">
      <h3 className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wide mb-2">{title}</h3>
      <div className="space-y-1">
        <p className={`text-3xl font-bold ${valueColorClass[color]}`}>{value}</p>
        <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">{subtitle}</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default StatsCard;
```
